title: Was she a woman accused while she was an indecent cop who killed her child?
subtitle: Mimi provided some factual information, but also ruled out many complications in telling the story of a crash that left a one-year-old child dead.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A woman was charged with murder for negligence after a 94-megabyte mobile car was hit by an out-of-service police officer with a four-wheel drive vehicle that she was travelling to and her infant daughter was killed.
